us.ba3.me

Interface VectorMapDelegate


  • public interface VectorMapDelegate
    Defines the interface for vector map delegates. Vector map delegates receive events from the mapping engine when the user interacts with geometry on a dynamic vector map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void lineSegmentHitDetected(java.lang.String mapName, java.lang.String shapeId, android.location.Location coordinate, int segmentStartIndex, int segmentEndIndex)
      Called when a hit is detected on a vector line segment.
      void vertexHitDetected(java.lang.String mapName, java.lang.String shapeID, android.location.Location coordinate, int vertexIndex)
      Called when a hit is detected on a vector line vertex.
